Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector.name: subscript(x:y:z:width:height:depth:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector.abstract: Subscript to retrieve or set a three dimensional submatrix of the matrix

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector.name: subscript(_:_:_:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector.abstract: Subscript to retrieve or set a single element of the matrix

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector.name: indices
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector.abstract: Indices of the tensor in the form (column,row,slice)

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: init(values:width:height:depth:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Initializes a three dimensional matrix from the given values and dimensions

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: init(values:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Initializes a three dimensional matrix from a vector of slices.

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: init(repeating:width:height:depth:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Initializes a three dimensional matrix and sets every value to the repeating value.

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: init(_:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Initializes a three dimensional matrix from a two dimensional matrix

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: reversed()
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Reverses the matrix. The element at position (i,j,k) will be at (width-i,height-j,depth-k)

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVecto.abstract: Performs a component wise addition of two matrices

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: map(_:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Returns a matrix generated from a matrix by applying the transform function to every element

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: mapv(_:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Returns a matrix generated from a matrix by applying the vectorized transform function to every element

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: reshaped(width:height:depth:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Reshapes the matrix into a new matrix containing the same values.

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: convolved(with:horizontalStride:verticalStride:lateralStride:horizontalInset:verticalInset:lateralInset:)
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Performs a convolution of the matrix using the provided convolution kernel

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.name: maxIndex()
Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector.abstract: Returns the index of the biggest value of the tensor

Structs/Matrix3.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVecto.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.name: values
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Values stored in the matrix as a flattened array.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.name: subscript(row:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Subscript for accessing a row of the matrix

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.name: subscript(column:row:width:height:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Subscript for accessing a submatrix of the matrix

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.name: subscript(column:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Subscript for accessing a column of the matrix

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.name: subscript(_:_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:iV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Subscript for accessing a single field of the matrix

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.name: indices
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Indices of the matrix in the form (column,row)

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: init(values:width:height:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Creates a new matrix with a given width and height

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: init(rows:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Creates a new matrix with the given rows.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: init(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Initializes a two dimensional matrix from a three dimensional tensor

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: init(repeating:width:height:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Initializes a matrix with the given dimensions and sets every value to the repeating value.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVector.name: add(_:_:secondScale:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVector.abstract: Performs an element wise addition of two matrices of equal dimensions.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: add(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Adds the matrix to the base matrix in place.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: add(_:factor:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Multiplies the matrix with the scalar factor and adds it onto the base matrix

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: addMultiplied(_:_:transposeFirst:transposeSecond:factor:destinationFactor:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Multiplies the two input matrices and adds them to the base matrix with the given factor

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVector.abstract: Performs an element wise addition of two matrices of equal dimensions
Performs an element wise addition of two matrices of equal dimensions
Multiplies every element of the matrix with the scalar and writes it back to the matrix.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.name: transposed
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:vV12MatrixVector6.abstract: The transposed matrix generated by swapping all fields (i,j) with (j,i).

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: convolved(with:horizontalStride:verticalStride:horizontalInset:verticalInset:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Performs a convolution of the matrix using the provided convolution kernel

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: reversed()
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Reverses the matrix. The element at position (i,j,k) will be at (width-i,height-j,depth-k)

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: map(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Returns a matrix generated from a matrix by applying the transform function to every element

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: mapv(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Returns a matrix generated from a matrix by applying the vectorized transform function to every element

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.name: reshaped(width:height:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:FV12MatrixVector6.abstract: Reshapes the matrix into a new matrix containing the same values.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:ZFV12MatrixVector.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectorop1sFGS.abstract: Negates every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi1mFTG.abstract: Calculates the dot product of two vectors.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2apFT.abstract: Performs a component wise addition of two input vectors

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2asFT.abstract: Performs a component wise subtraction of two input vectors

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2amFT.abstract: Performs a component wise multiplication of two input vectors

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2adFT.abstract: Performs a component wise division of two input vectors

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2apFT.abstract: Performs a component wise addition of an input vector with a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2asFT.abstract: Performs a component wise subtraction of an input vector with a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2amFT.abstract: Performs a component wise multiplication of an input vector with a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2adFT.abstract: Performs a component wise division of an input vector with a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2apFT.abstract: Performs a component wise addition of an input vector and a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2asFT.abstract: Performs a component wise subtraction of an input scalar and a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2amFT.abstract: Performs a component wise multiplication of an input vector and a scalar

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi2adFT.abstract: Performs a component wise division of an input scalar and a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi3apeF.abstract: Performs a component wise in place addition of two input vectors.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVectoroi3aseF.abstract: Performs a component wise in place subtraction of the two input vectors.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4sqrtFG.name: sqrt(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4sqrtFG.abstract: Calculates the element wise square root of an input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3expFGS.name: exp(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3expFGS.abstract: Calculates the exponential function e^x for every element x of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4tanhFG.name: tanh(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4tanhFG.abstract: Calculates the tangens hyperbolicus for every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector10tanh_.name: tanh_deriv(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector10tanh_.abstract: Calculates the derivative of the tangens hyperbolicus for every element of the input vector.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3logFGS.name: log(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3logFGS.abstract: Calcualtes the natural logarithm of every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3powFTG.name: pow(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3powFTG.abstract: Raises each element of the base vector to its corresponding element of the exponent vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector8copysi.name: copysign(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector8copysi.abstract: Sets the sign on the values of the first vector based on the sign of the second vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4reluFG.name: relu(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4reluFG.abstract: Computes a rectified linear unit activation function

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector10relu_.name: relu_deriv(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector10relu_.abstract: Computes the derivative of a rectified linear unit activation function

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4onesFG.name: ones(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector4onesFG.abstract: Returns a vector containing ones with the same length as the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector5zerosF.name: zeros(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector5zerosF.abstract: Returns a vector containing zeros with the same length as the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector7sigmoi.name: sigmoid(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector7sigmoi.abstract: Calculates the sigmoid function for every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector13sigmo.name: sigmoid_deriv(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector13sigmo.abstract: Calculates the derivative of the sigmoid function of the input vector.

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3sumFGS.name: sum(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3sumFGS.abstract: Calculates the sum of all elements of a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector7softma.name: softmax(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector7softma.abstract: Calculates the softmax function for every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector13softm.name: softmax_deriv(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector13softm.abstract: Calculates the derivative of the softmax function for every element of the input vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3maxFGS.name: max(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3maxFGS.abstract: Finds the maximum value of a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3minFGS.name: min(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector3minFGS.abstract: Finds the minimum value of a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector6argmax.name: argmax(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector6argmax.abstract: Finds the maximum value and its index of a vector

Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector6argmin.name: argmin(_:)
Functions.html#/s:F12MatrixVector6argmin.abstract: Finds the minimum value and its index of a vector
